input.sentences: the old ruins had many secrets .
archaeologists have dug up many neat things .
they found old tools for mashing things .
and they also found old coins .
this is an example of ancient pottery .
output.sentences: These are the ancient ruins of a Nordic family home.
The archaeologists uncovered what today we would call a living room.
It included some tools and primitive table for cooking.
The walls were covered with a patterned rock.
Lastly, they discovered some primitive art.
